overview:
Nikos is the Director of Marketing at Sustainable Life Media (SLM). In this role he is responsible for the marketing team, and oversees all communications and marketing initiatives. This includes managing the communications strategy and analyzing the success of various campaigns, strategizing and executing the promotion of SLM’s products, international events and conferences, and optimizing website customer conversion rates.

With an unrelenting curiosity about new media communications and how it is playing a role in shaping today’s society, Nikos came to California, where he completed his MS in Integrated Marketing Communications at Golden Gate University in 2009.

Nikos has received multiple awards and honors recognizing his work in the marketing communications space, including the Excellence in Marketing Award 2008 from American Marketing Association.

His innate creativity matched with his resourcefulness creates the perfect blend of innovative strategic thinking needed to work on a small team creating a huge impact.
